Ruby on Rails

Services and methodology

  • Ruby on Rails

Is there a compelling reason to use Unboxed Consulting for your next Internet Application Build?

We help our customers, both large and small, realise their online ambitions. We have seen the rise in demand for internet applications and the increase in complexity this brings. We understand the challenges this poses. Our background is in complex enterprise integration deliveries. We know projects often experience inefficiency in process, frustrations of customers and technology that is being adapted to fit into the online world. We saw a better way of delivering these online projects.

There is a better way

We have taken what we have learnt about the need for secure, scalable, maintainable, available systems and then taken a quantum leap. We have chosen a technology stack that is build from the ground up to be the most efficient way to deliver internet applications today. We have built an infrastructure around that technology that promotes efficiency and best practice. We have selected the best developers and formed cohesive teams with the perfect mix of skills. We have ensured that we have a development process that get the best quality product delivered in the most efficient way. We then ensure that quality permeates through everything we do. We have bundled all this up in a customer engagement model that gets the right product build with the minimum of fuss. And to ensure we are the best we can be, we constantly re-examine what we are doing. We ensure that we are using the best technology, the best processes and the best people. Our customers love working with us and we love delivering great projects.

It is all about risk reduction

If you want to de-risk your next project, chose a team that has a proven track record of on-time, to-budget delivery. Choose a team that has an ISO9001 approved process from inception, through delivery and into maintenance. Choose a team that puts quality first. Choose a team that prides itself in zero production outage goals. Choose a team that has yet to fail a security penetration test. Choose a team that specialises in the best technology, that hones their skills to be the best they can be. Choose a team that embraces collaboration, transparency and honesty.

Give us a call if you want to know more.
